name: Application Ally
description-long: A simple and effective job application management system with job search features
TechStack: NextJS, MongoDB, Javascript, React, TailwindCSS, Mongoose, NodeJS

name: Local Reports
description-long: Hackathon project aims to improve community safety by enabling parents to report missing children and share crucial details about them. It also allows nearby community members to report sightings.
TechStack: TypeScript, NextJS, React, Cloudflare, Tailwind CSS

name: Weather Wear
description-long: Simple Web application that sends you an email about proper cloting attire based of today's weather

name: MyPass
description-long: Simple Password manager that stores your passwords locally in a json file

name: Shell Replica
description-long: Reimplementation of a shell using the pre-built unix commands and by creating a fork of a parent process
